IDBIndexLocale.summary: The locale read-only property of the interface returns the locale of the index (for example en-US, or pl) if it had a locale value specified upon its creation (see the options parameter to IDBObjectStore.createIndex().) Note that this property always returns the current locale being used in this index, in other words, it never returns "auto".
